page.title: 17ROLLS FARM- continued
page.content: Much has been learned of the importance of soil crumb structure and of the disastrous results which can occur if land management disregards its importance. The use of wide soil tilling machinery is both time and fuel saving. New machinery takes into account not only the need for machines which will process the greatest surface area per run, but also the weight factor-high wheel loading candamage soil crumb structure.Designs which loosen surface soil whilst producing a sub-surface hard-pan of near impenetrable clay cause poor root development & consequent poor nutrient absorption. A recent innovation is the use of a rotating eccentric weight to produce a vibrating effect in the tine blades, so causing breakup & avoiding compacting the substrata.
